name: Project Daedalus: Overcharge
description:
*Early Development*

The desolate fringe worlds still have many settlements that have found ways to thrive. But elite scavenger clans threaten their existence. You must protect them.

In this Tower Defence game you must plan your placements carefully. Resources are not infinite and powering the defences out here is not easy. Strategically decide what defences need to be online, and which can stay off. Or spend the extra resources to expand the available power.

Keyboard Shortcuts:-

Q - Build

W - Sell

E - Power

R - Overcharge
